backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented Valentine experience features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all key frontend Valentine experience files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables defining light/dark Valentine-themed color system and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component coordinating all Valentine scenes, asset preloading, autoplay-safe ambient audio, and global music controls.
frontend/src/components/valentine/assets: Exports paths to all Valentine scene image and audio assets.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Backgr: Floating mute/unmute button using shadcn UI and lucide icons to toggle background audio.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Contin: Centered bouncing continue button that triggers scene-to-scene scrolling.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Letter: Exports the full static Valentine letter text for display in the mailbox scene.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Loadin: Full‑screen loading screen with progress bar and animated heart shown while assets preload.
frontend/src/components/valentine/MovieT: Drag‑and‑drop mini‑game where users move a ticket into a target box to reveal event info before progressing.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Openin: Interactive mailbox that reveals an envelope and unfolding letter, then enables continuation to the next scene.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Scratc: Renders an unlockable framed illustration with a scratch-off canvas and sparkle animations triggered after sufficient scratching.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAmbientAudio.ts: Manages looping background audio with readiness, autoplay handling, and mute toggling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetPreloader.ts: Preloads Valentine assets and tracks loading progress for images and audio.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Supplies Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and related auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useScratchOffCanvas.t: Implements scratch-off interaction over a canvas, tracking scratched percentage and pointer events.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom Valentine's colors, fonts, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color palette, playful fonts, radius, shadows, and numerous float/bounce/sparkle animations with keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, known issues, and design direction for a playful Valentine’s interactive page, plus notes on image edits and accessibility fixes.
